tutorial.rules1: Each player has 3 cards and must fulfill 3 categories. To earn a point in a category the player needs to win a round in that category. The player who finishes all categories first wins!
tutorial.rules2:
But watch out! There's a limit on how many points you are allowed to spend. 
 If both players play a card of the same category, both cards points will contribute to the limit. If your opponent doesn't have a fitting card for this category, you are lucky and get away with just the points of your card.
